data.title: Child artist Taruni Sachdev killed in Nepal plane crash

data.text:
IBNS, Glamsham Editorial

An Indian child artist died in the Nepal plane crash that killed 15 people in on Monday. 14-year-old Taruni Sachdev, who was seen sharing screen space with Bollywood superstar Amitabh Bachchan in PAA, died in the mishap.

Taruni's mother, who was travelling in the plane along with her, also died in the accident. The child actor appeared in more than 50 commercials in her career.

Amitabh Bachchan tweeted, "Just reading that Taruni Sachdev the girl child artist in Paa, has perished in Nepal plane crash .. please God may this not be true."

Bollywood actor Abhishek Bachchan reacted, "SHOCKED and very saddened to hear about the Nepal plane crash. Lost 1 of my cutest co-stars. Little Taruni Sachdev from PAA. Speechless....."

A small plane with tourists crashed in Nepal's northern Himalayan mountain region before landing in one of the risky airports on Monday morning, killed at least 15 people, including 13 Indians.
